summary: VEHICLE STOPPED WITHOUT ANY REASON AND WAS UNABLE TO RESTART IT. THIS IS A HAZARD IF IT HAD OCCURRED ON A FREEWAY OR OTHER FAST MOVING HIGHWAY.
